testcase.name: using { type: 'chrome' }
testcase.system-out:
* def webUrlBase = "http://localhost:8999" ................................ passed * def config = { type: 'chrome' } ......................................... passed * set config.showDriverLog = true ......................................... passed * configure driver = config ............................................... passed Given driver webUrlBase + '/page-01' ...................................... passed And waitFor('#eg01WaitId') ................................................ passed And waitForText('#eg01WaitId', 'APPEARED') ................................ passed And waitForText('body', 'APPEARED') ....................................... passed And waitForEnabled('#eg01WaitId') ......................................... passed And waitUntil('#eg01WaitId', "function(e){ return e.innerHTML == 'APPEARED!' }") . passed And waitUntil('#eg01WaitId', "_.innerHTML == 'APPEARED!'") ................ passed And waitUntil('#eg01WaitId', '!_.disabled') ............................... passed And match script('#eg01WaitId', "function(e){ return e.innerHTML }") == 'APPEARED!' . passed And match script('#eg01WaitId', '_.innerHTML') == 'APPEARED!' ............. passed And match script('#eg01WaitId', '!_.disabled') == true .................... passed And input('#eg02InputId', Key.CONTROL + 'a') .............................. passed And def temp = text('#eg02DivId') ......................................... passed And match temp contains '17d' ............................................. passed And match temp contains '65u' ............................................. passed And script('#eg02DivId', "_.innerHTML = ''") .............................. passed When input('#eg02InputId', 'aa') .......................................... passed Then def temp = text('#eg02DivId') ........................................ passed And match temp contains '65u' ............................................. passed * def cookie1 = { name: 'foo', value: 'bar' } ............................. passed And match driver.cookies contains '#(^cookie1)' ........................... passed And match cookie('foo') contains cookie1 .................................. passed And driver.dimensions = { x: 0, y: 0, width: 300, height: 800 } ........... passed And input('#eg01InputId', 'hello world') .................................. passed When click('input[name=eg01SubmitName]') .................................. passed And match value('#eg01InputId') == 'hello world' .......................... passed Then match text('#eg01DivId') == 'hello world' ............................ passed And match attribute('#eg01SubmitId', 'type') == 'submit' .................. passed And match script('#eg01SubmitId', '_.tagName') == 'INPUT' ................. passed And match enabled('#eg01InputId') == true ................................. passed And match enabled('#eg01DisabledId') == false ............................. passed When clear('#eg01InputId') ................................................ passed And input('#eg01InputId', 'something else') ............................... passed And match value('#eg01InputId') == 'something else' ....................... passed When value('#eg01InputId', 'something more') .............................. passed And match value('#eg01InputId') == 'something more' ....................... passed When refresh() ............................................................ passed Then match driver.url == webUrlBase + '/page-01' .......................... passed And match text('#eg01DivId') == '' ........................................ passed And match value('#eg01InputId') == '' ..................................... passed And match driver.title == 'Page One' ...................................... passed When driver webUrlBase + '/page-02'
